name: Can You Canoe?
description:
Paddle through as fast as you can through these water tracks with your trusty canoe!

Left/Right or A/D to paddle (Mobile controls also available)

CTRL+R Restart

ESC for menu

This game was created with Fancade, purchasing of gems will give all monetization to the Fancade Company. To support me as a developer, donate here to support me directly, or use the gems to purchase Can You Canoe coins.
